name: Ascension Online
blurb: Bring the Ascension Deckbuilding Game to Android and PC with new features like online tournaments, campaign mode, and more!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Militia Tier!  You'll get a Kickstarter exclusive promo card\u2014in both paper and digital form!
Digital Apprentice Tier! A digital copy of the Kickstarter promo and all of our expansions up to Immortal Heroes on Android and PC for free!
Apprentice Tier!  All unlimited rewards above and all of our expansions up to Immortal Heroes on Android and PC for free!

Mystic Tier!  All unlimited rewards above, plus an alternate-art starting deck for both your paper and digital Ascension games. This tier also includes entry into a backers-only tournament where you'll have a chance to play against the developers!  You'll also get a Kickstarter-exclusive forum badge and in-game avatar.

SPECIAL MINI DIGITAL ONLY TIER! This Digital-Only tier includes the digital version of unlimited rewards above (physical rewards are NOT included). In addition, you will receive access to the beta, have the ability to reserve your account name in-game before anyone else, and get an exclusive Ascension Online Skin!
EARLY BIRD TREASURE HUNTER TIER!  \r\n\r\nAll of the rewards of the $50 Treasure Hunter tier for just $45!  Back early for the best deal!
MOSTLY EARLY BIRD TREASURE HUNTER TIER! All of the rewards of the $50 Treasure Hunter Tier for just $46! Back early for the best deal (well, second best)!
RELATIVELY EARLY BIRD TREASURE HUNTER TIER! All of the rewards of the $50 Treasure Hunter Tier for just $47! Back early for the best deal (well, better deal)!
KINDA EARLY BIRD TREASURE HUNTER TIER! All of the rewards of the $50 Treasure Hunter Tier for just $48! Back early for the best deal (well, a slightly better deal)!

Treasure Hunter Tier!  All unlimited rewards above, plus an advance copy of our next expansion, "Rise of Vigil" (estimated release April 2013), including the pre-order promo card Lotus Siren! (Rise of Vigil Ships in March 2013.)
EARLY BIRD DIGITAL-ONLY TIER!  All of the rewards of the $100 tier for just $95!  Back early for the best deal!

SPECIAL DIGITAL-ONLY TIER! 

Ascension Online for Life! 

For backers who don't want any physical items, this tier includes digital copies of the Kickstarter promo card and alternate-art starting deck, as well as a free digital copy of every Ascension expansion we ever produce!
Magnet Monk Tier! All unlimited tiers above (includes digital-only tier and all physical items)

Cult Smasher Tier! \r\n\r\nAll unlimited tiers above, plus an exclusive Ascension Backer t-shirt, an Ascension playmat, and a Cultist bobblehead!  Add some extra fun to your games with a custom Cultist bobblehead you can hit every time you defeat the cultist!

Ascension Designer Tier! \r\n\r\nMake your own card!  All unlimited tiers above, plus you can send us a design and art image for an Ascension card, and we'll create it and send you copies for yourself and your friends!  If we like your design, we may even use it in an upcoming expansion.
Ascension Art Lover Tier!  All unlimited tiers above, plus you can choose a piece of Ascension art and receive a high-quality print signed by the artist, Eric Sabee!
Super Early Bird Ultimate Collector's Edition Tier!  All the rewards of the $450 tier for only $400!!
Mostly Early Bird Ultimate Collector's Edition Tier! All the rewards of the $450 tier for only $410!!
Relatively Early Bird Ultimate Collector's Edition Tier! All the rewards of the $450 tier for only $420!!

Ascension Collector's Edition Tier!  All unlimited tiers above, plus receive a copy of the premium Ascension Ultimate Collector's Edition!  The Ultimate Collector's Edition features premium foil versions of every card printed in the first two years of Ascension's existence, including all four expansions and every promo card and promo pack!  Also included are a high quality display box, new game board, and premium quality honor tokens.

Ascension Immortal Tier! \r\n\r\nAll unlimited tiers above, plus your art on a card in an upcoming Ascension release!  Send us a picture of you and we'll commission art in your likeness for a card in a future Ascension set!  Your art will also be made available as an avatar in Ascension Online, so you'll be able to play as yourself in the game!

Adayu, the Chosen Tier!  All unlimited tiers above, plus we will create an avatar of the Adayu, the Chosen art reserved exclusively for you!  No one in Ascension Online will ever be able to play as Adayu except you!

Emri, Soulslayer Tier!  All unlimited tiers above, plus we will create an avatar of the Emri, Soulslayer art reserved exclusively for you!  No one in Ascension Online will ever be able to play as Emri except you!

P.R.I.M.E. Tier!  All unlimited tiers above, plus we will create an avatar of the P.R.I.M.E art reserved exclusively for you!  No one in Ascension Online will ever be able to play as P.R.I.M.E except you!

Syril, Runic Alpha Tier!  All unlimited tiers above, plus we will create an avatar of the Syril, Runic Alpha art reserved exclusively for you!  No one in Ascension Online will ever be able to play as Syril except you!

Gen Con Experience Tier!  \r\n\r\nAll unlimited tiers above, plus you'll be invited to a night of dinner and gaming with the Stone Blade Entertainment team at Gen Con 2013!  You are responsible for your own travel.

Ascension for Life Tier!   All unlimited tiers above, plus free Ascension for the rest of your life!  You will receive a copy of every printed Ascension product we release shipped free to your home\u2014forever!

Stone Blade Experience Tier!  Includes all unlimited rewards above, plus you'll be able to come out to San Diego to visit the Stone Blade offices!  You'll be able to hang out at the office for up to a full week, work with the team, and get a behind-the-scenes look at how our games are made. You are responsible for your own travel.

Ascension to Greatness Tier!  Includes all unlimited rewards above, plus we will immortalize you as a major character in the Ascension world!  We will work with you to create  a recurring character in the Ascension storyline and expansion sets, and you'll be a total badass!
